You are working in a .NET MAUI repository.

GOAL
Make CI succeed for BOTH targets with 0 errors (warnings ok):
1) dotnet build Biliardo.App/Biliardo.App.csproj -c Debug -f net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0 --no-restore
2) dotnet build Biliardo.App/Biliardo.App.csproj -c Debug -f net8.0-android --no-restore

RULES
- Keep changes minimal and strictly related to fixing build errors.
- Do NOT modify generated outputs under **/bin or **/obj.
- Do NOT add secrets or credentials to the repo.

PROCESS
- Run the Windows build; if it fails, fix code and retry until it passes.
- Run the Android build; if it fails, fix code and retry until it passes.
- When both pass, stop.
